error_mail_not_valid.en: The email address you just entered is not valid. Please try again.

error_mail_not_send.en: An error has occured. Please try again.

send_mail_new_token.en:
JANUS has registered the email address.
An email with a link has been sent to %USERMAIL%.
To log into the JANUS, click the link in the email.

send_mail_new_token_by_old.en:
It is not possible to reuse your login link.
You will receive a mail containing a new login link.

text_login_help.en:
To login you need to recive an email.
Enter your email address or click the link in the recived email.

text_create_account_help.en:
To create a new account you need to recive an email.
Enter your email address or click the link in the recived email.
